seo.title: Working as a javascript expert at Wheelhouse and expand our team
seo.description: At Wheelhouse, we encourage everyone to think and work on our strategy. Initiative and new insights are stimulated to deliver a valuable solution together.

blocks.text: Want to get in touch for a job or internship?
At Wheelhouse, we help you develop your talents to build a high-quality career path. So let’s talk if you’re interested!
Before we start, what is your full name?
Nice to meet you! Let’s talk Wheelhouse first:

We are a group of JavaScript consultants. We’re looking for people who fit into our community, who have an open mind and like to try out new things! Like these new strange conversational forms. So if you are interested, we would like to get to know you better!
Now, we are interested in what you are looking for in a job. So, how do you see yourself in Wheelhouse?
One thing we like is seeing new stuff! Do you have a portfolio (GitHub, website, ...) that you are willing to share?
We love getting to know you better. What do you do in your free time?
Interesting! We like escape rooms, cooking, plants, cosplay, games, and much more. So, you could say we’re pretty diverse.
I’m starting to feel that we are getting to know each other pretty well!
After sending this form, we want to reach out to you. So leave your contact information here.
Alright! Last question, then you can go back to what you were doing!
Do you have a CV? We like getting an overview of your previous experiences and your current skillset. You can upload your CV in pdf format.
blocks.name: file

blocks.text: Please confirm your answers down below.
Make sure your contact information is correct. Otherwise, we won't be able to get in touch.
Thank you so much for your attention!
